name: Supercars 2 AGA
description:
Supercars 2 AGA by JOTD

A reboot of Supercars 2 by Magnetic Fields / Gremlin for A1200/A4000 computers using AGA graphics

- 256 color screens from Supercars 3 international

- colored enemy cars instead of gray ones (128 colors displayed on screen)

- based on original Shaun Southern source code

- optional in-game music (choice between sfx only, J.M.D tunes, Lotus tunes)

- joypad controls

- runs on a 2MB chip vanilla A1200 in DOS mode with a hard disk

- NTSC screen layout (whdload only)

- 100% same Supercars 2 gameplay

How to run:

With whdload:

whdload supercars2.slave preload

Then change options in the splash screen

Without whdload:

cd data

sc2

Add "j" option to sc2 to enable cd32 joypad controls: sc2 j

Joypad controls:

reverse: rear weapon (instead of joydown)

forward: front weapon (instead of joyup)

play: pause

reverse+forward when paused: ESC

Keyboard controls:

P: pause

M (during start menu): switches music mode (screen flashes blue)
